remarks: Alternate definition of restricted "at most one."  Note that ` E* x e. A ph ` is not equivalent to ` E. y e. A A. x e. A ( ph -> x = y ) ` (in analogy to ~ reu6 ); to see this, let ` A ` be the empty set.  However, one direction of this pattern holds; see ~ rmo2i .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
statement:
rmo2.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
rmo2 $p |- ( E* x e. A ph <-> E. y A. x e. A ( ph -> x = y ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
